text: Marijke Johanna Stultiens-Thunnissen (12 April 1927 â€“ 4 February 2025) was a Dutch textile artist and painter. She was married to artist Rob Stultiens and lived in Bunde. She had several exihibitions, including at the Stedelijk Museum in Roermond (1989, 2007) and together with her husband in the cultural center in Venlo in 1969. She became knight in the Order of Orange Nassau in 1995. On the occasion of her 70th birthday, L1 made a television report about her and a monograph was published by Stedelijk Museum Roermond. She received a provincial medal of honor in 2017. Thunnissen died in Bunde on 4 February 2025, at the age of 97. ==References== Category:Dutch artists Category:Dutch painters Category:1927 births Category:2025 deaths Category:People from North Brabant
title: Marijke Thunnissen
